com.opengamma.strata.calc.marketdata

Class CalculationEnvironmentBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opengamma.strata.calc.marketdata.CalculationEnvironmentBuilder

  • public final class CalculationEnvironmentBuilder
extends Object
    A mutable builder for building up CalculationMarketDataMap instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> CalculationEnvironmentBuilder addResult(MarketDataId<T> id, Result<MarketDataBox<T>> result)
      Adds a result for a single item of market data, replacing any existing value with the same ID.
      <T> CalculationEnvironmentBuilder addResultUnsafe(MarketDataId<T> id, Result<MarketDataBox<?>> result)
      Adds a result for a single item of market data, replacing any existing value with the same ID.
      CalculationEnvironmentBuilder addTimeSeries(ObservableId id, LocalDateDoubleTimeSeries timeSeries)
      Adds a time series of observable market data values, replacing any existing time series with the same ID.
      CalculationEnvironmentBuilder addTimeSeriesResult(ObservableId id, Result<LocalDateDoubleTimeSeries> result)
      Adds a time series of observable market data values, replacing any existing time series with the same ID.
      <T> CalculationEnvironmentBuilder addValue(MarketDataId<T> id, List<T> values)
      Adds multiple values for an item of market data, one for each scenario.

      Adds a single item of market data, replacing any existing value with the same ID.

      Builds a set of market data from the data in this builder.
      CalculationEnvironmentBuilder valuationDate(LocalDate valuationDate)
      Sets the valuation date associated with the market data, replacing the existing valuation date.
      CalculationEnvironmentBuilder valuationDate(MarketDataBox<LocalDate> valuationDate)
      Sets the valuation date associated with the market data, replacing the existing valuation date.

      • build

        public CalculationEnvironment build()
        Builds a set of market data from the data in this builder.

        It is possible to continue to add more data to a builder after calling build(). Any CalculationEnvironment instances built previously will be unaffected.

        Returns:
        a set of market data from the data in this builder
